page.title: 04CHILDHOOD NOW
page.content: My name is Katherine McCann and this is a description of one day in my life.I wake up at 7.30 and get out of bed.Then I wash and get dressed.For breakfast I have a bowl of cereal and a piece of toast.Then afterwards I clean my teeth.Then I get in the car and my mum drives me to school. When I get to school we go in to the hall for an assembly.After this we have maths which is fractions.Then we have playtime for 20 minutes.When we come back in we have spellings, meanings and sometimes SRA.That takes me up to lunch time.After lunch I have group reading and that lasts for an hour.After that we go by coach to Cranleigh pool for a swimming lesson until 3.30.Then I go home.At 4.45 I go to my tap dancing lesson.Then I will go home and have my tea.At 7.30 I have my bath and then I go to bed.
